title: Kieni Phase-3
description: Nestled in the lush landscapes of Mathira, Nyeri County, this prime residential plot spans approximately 0.125 acres of fertile volcanic soil, ideal for tea farming or vibrant gardens. Enjoy breathtaking views of Mount Kenya and Aberdare Ranges, with easy access to Nyeri Town via well-maintained roads. Proximity to schools, hospitals, and markets ensures convenience in this serene, agriculturally rich area. Perfect for a countryside retreat or wise investment in Kenya's central highlands.
